mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.*FROM ( SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') REPLY_DT, REPLY_TYPE_NO, REPLY_TARGET_NO, USER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, REPLY_STAR, USER_IMG, PARENT_NO, REPLY_ST FROM "REPLY" JOIN USER_INFO USING(USER_NO) WHERE REPLY_TYPE_NO = #{replyTypeNo} AND REPLY_TARGET_NO = #{replyTargetNo}) C START WITH PARENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR REPLY_NO = PARENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY REPLY_NO
